entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as having his blood pressure rising and his voice thick with anger. He is also referred to as the leader of an illegal student organization.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as being beside Harry and speaking silkily. She is also referred to as Minister.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as responding to Fudge's statement with an innocent look on his face.

entities.name: d.a.
entities.description: The D.A. is mentioned as being discovered within the school by Umbridge.

relationships.description: Umbridge mentions that she might fetch their informant, implying that Fudge and Umbridge have a relationship where Fudge is the informant.
Harry responds to Fudge's statement with an innocent look on his face, suggesting that they are acquaintances.
